title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jun 28 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jun 28 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: Trump on crime at Ohio rally. Ted Cruz on Democrats and crime. AOC on crime. Shooting in Times Square. Critical Race Theory. MSNBC host Chris Hayes says opposition to CRT proves CRT. Covid Bros ruin College World Series, don't allow NC State to play because of covid cases. Clay and Buck discuss tomorrow's interview with President Trump.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
